scenario.name: Basic Sipstone UAC
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "[service]" <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: "[service]" <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 REGISTER Max-Forwards: 70 Contact: "[service]" <sip:[service]-office@[customip1]:5062>;transport=[transport] Contact: "[service]" <sip:[service]-home@[customip2]:5063>;transport=[transport] Subject: Performance Test Expires: 10 Content-Length: 0
